description:
- I`ll go. I`ll save Mana. And Ryoma`s coming with me! -
When it seems even Walpurgis`s magic can`t stop the monstrous Mana,
Ren and company discover that Mana`s real body is hidden inside Miroku`s altar.
Heeding Walpurgis`s words, Ren and Ryoma rush onward to save Mana!
Source: Youtube

titles.title: Only Thou Can Know What Thou Must Do
Waga Nasu Koto wa Waga Nomizu Shiru
我が成すことは我のみぞ知る
